MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1CO.12.13	Son liorish un Spyrryd ta shin ooilley er nyn mashtey ayns un chorp

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1CO.12.14	Son cha vel y corp un olt

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1CO.12.15	My jir y chass
mac Ghavid: Er yn oyr nagh nee mish y laue

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1CO.12.16	As my jir y chleaysh

cha vel mee jeh’n chorp; nagh vel eh son shen jeh’n chorp?

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1CO.12.17	Dy beagh yn slane corp ny hooill

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1CO.12.18	Agh nish ta Jee er hoiaghey ny oltyn

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1CO.12.19	As dy beagh ad oilley un olt
mac Ghavid: cre veagh y corp?

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1CO.12.20	Agh nish t’ad ymmodee oltyn

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1CO.12.21	As cha vod y tooill gra rish y laue

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1CO.12.24	Son cha vel ny oltyn aalin ain feme er shoh: agh ta Jee er chummey yn corp dy cheilley

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1CO.12.25	Nagh beagh scarrey erbee ayns y chorp: agh dy beagh ec ooilley ny oltyn yn chiarail cheddin yn derrey yeh son y jeh elley.

column4: ’sy trass ynnyd fir-ynsee

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1CO.13.12	Son nish ta shin fakin trooid gless dy dorraghey; agh eisht eddin dy eddin: nish ta my enney ayns ayrn; agh eisht bee my enney dy jarroo myr ta enney orrym pene.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1CO.14.2	Son eshyn ta loayrt ayns chengey yoarree

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1CO.15.13	Agh mannagh vel ny merriu girree reesht

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1CO.15.24	Eisht ta’n jerrey cheet

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.2.7	Nagh vel ad goltooan yn ennym ooasle shen ta enmyssit erriu?
JAS.2.8	My ta shiu cooilleeney yn leigh reooil
mac Ghavid: cordail rish y scriptyr
Ver oo graih da dy naboo myr dhyt hene
column4: ta shiu jannoo dy mie.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.2.9	Agh my ta shiu jannoo soiagh jeh persoonyn
mac Ghavid: ta shiu jannoo peccah
as ta shiu deyrit liorish y leigh myr drogh-yantee.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.2.10	Son quoi-erbee nee freayll yn slane leigh
mac Ghavid: as ny yeih ta foiljagh ayns un phoint
t’eh kyndagh jeu ooilley.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.2.11	Son eshyn dooyrt
mac Ghavid: Ny jean poosey vrishey; dooyrt myrgeddin
Ny jean dunverys. Nish ga nagh vel oo brishey poosey
column4: ny-yeih my t’ou dunverys

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.2.12	Myr shen loayr-jee
mac Ghavid: as myr shen jean-jee
myr adsyn vees er nyn mriwnys liorish y leigh dy reamys [creestee].

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.2.13	Son yiow eshyn briwnys dyn myghin
mac Ghavid: nagh vel er hoilshaghey myghin; as ta myghin boggyssagh harrish briwnys.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.2.14	Cre sheeagh eh
mac Ghavid: my vraaraghyn
da dooinney dy ghra dy vel credjue echey
column4: as nagh vel obbraghyn echey? vod credjue y hauail eh?

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.2.15	My ta braar ny shuyr rooisht
mac Ghavid: ny feme beaghey gagh-laa;

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.2.16	As unnane eu dy ghra roo
mac Ghavid: Immee-jee reue ayns shee
dy row fastee as beaghey eu: as nagh vel shiu coyrt daue ny reddyn shen ta ymmyrchagh da’n chorp; cre-woad share ad?

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.2.17	Eer myr shen credjue
mac Ghavid: mannagh vel obbraghyn goll mârish
te dyn vree ny lomarcan.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.2.18	Agh foddee fer gra
mac Ghavid: Ta credjue ayd’s
as ta obbraghyn aym’s: jeeagh dooys yn credjue ayd’s fegooish dty obbraghyn
column4: as jeeagh-yms dhyts yn credjue aym’s liorish my obbraghyn.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.2.19	T’ou credjal dy vel un Jee ayn; t’ou jannoo dy mie: ta ny drogh-spyrrydyn hene credjal
mac Ghavid: as er-creau.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.2.20	Agh nailt fys ’ve ayd
mac Ghavid: O ghooinney ardalagh
dy vel credjue fegooish obbraghyn marroo?

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.2.21	Nagh row Abraham nyn ayr er ny heyrey liorish obbraghyn

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.2.22	Nagh vaik oo kys ren credjue niartaghey lesh e obbraghyn
mac Ghavid: as liorish obbraghyn
va slane mullagh er credjue?

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.2.23	As va’n scriptyr er ny chooilleeney ta gra
mac Ghavid: Chred Abraham Jee
as ve coontit da son cairys: as v’eh enmyssit carrey Yee.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.2.24	Hee shiu eisht kys dy nee liorish obbraghyn ta dooinney er ny heyrey

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.2.25	Myrgeddin neesht
mac Ghavid: nagh row Rahab yn ven-oast er ny heyrey liorish obbraghyn

column4: as er choyrt magh ad raad elley?

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.2.26	Son myr ta’n corp fegooish y spyrryd marroo

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.3.1	My vraaraghyn
mac Ghavid: ny shir-jee dy ve ymmodee fir-ynsee
toiggal [liorish shoh] dy bee mayd ny s’geyre er nyn mriwnys.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.3.2	Son ayns ymmodee reddyn ta shin ooilley foiljagh. My ta dooinney erbee nagh vel foiljagh ayns e ghlare
mac Ghavid: ta’n fer cheddin ny ghooinney ynrick
as abyl myrgeddin dy reayll yn slane corp fo smaght.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.3.3	Cur-my-ner ta shin coyrt streeanyn ayns beïll ny cabbil
mac Ghavid: dy bee ad beasagh dooin; as ta shin reill yn slane corp oc.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.3.4	Cur-jee my-ner neesht ny lhongyn
mac Ghavid: ga dy vel ad wheesh
as er ny imman lesh geayghyn niartal
column4: foast t’ad er ny hyndaa mygeayrt lesh stiurey beg fardalagh

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.3.5	Myr shen ta’n chengey ny olt beg
mac Ghavid: as boggyssagh reddyn mooarey. Cur-my-ner
cre’n lossey mooar ta drillin dy aile foaddey!

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.3.6	As t’an chengey ny aile
mac Ghavid: seihll dy vee-chairys: myr shen ta’n chengey mastey ny oltyn ain
dy vel ee milhey yn slane corp
column4: as cur yn seihll bun-ry-skyn; as t’ee soit er aile liorish niurin.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.3.7	Son ta dy chooilley ghooghys dy veiyn
mac Ghavid: as dy eeanlee
as dy ard-nieughyn
column4: as reddyn ayns yn aarkey
column6: as er ny ve jeant meen liorish deiney;

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.3.8	Agh y chengey cha vod dooinney erbee y smaghtaghey; t’ee olk mee-reiltagh
mac Ghavid: lane dy physhoon baasoil.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.3.9	Lesh ta shin bannaghey Jee
mac Ghavid: dy jarroo yn Ayr; as lesh ta shin gweeaghyn da deiney
ta jeant lurg caslys Yee.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.3.10	Ass yn un veeal ta cheet bannaght as mollaght. My vraaraghyn
mac Ghavid: cha lhisagh ny reddyn shoh ve myr shen.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.3.11	Vel farrane cur magh ass yn un gheill ushtey millish as sharroo?
JAS.3.12	Vod y billey-figgagh
mac Ghavid: my vraaraghyn
gymmyrkey berrishyn-olive? ny billey-feeyney figgyn? myr shen cha vod farrane erbee cur magh ushtey sailjey as oor?

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.3.13	Quoi ta ny ghooinney creeney as tushtagh ny mast’ eu? lhig da soilshaghey
mac Ghavid: liorish ymmyrkey mie
e obbraghyn ayns y veenid dy chreenaght.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.3.14	Agh my ta eu myskid sharroo as streeu ayns nyn greeaghyn
mac Ghavid: ny jean-jee boggyssagh
as ny jean-jee breg noi’n irriney.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.3.15	Cha vel y chreenaght shoh cheet neose veih’n yrjey
mac Ghavid: agh te thallooinagh
beishtagh
column4: niurinagh.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.3.16	Son raad ta troo as streeu
mac Ghavid: ayns shen ta anvea
as dy chooilley ghrogh obbyr.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.3.17	Agh y chreenaght ta veih’n yrjey t’ee hoshiaght glen
mac Ghavid: eisht sheeoil
meen
column4: as aashagh dy ve coyrlit
column5: lane dy erreeish as dy vessyn mie

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.3.18	As ta’n mess dy ynrickys er ny chuirr ayns shee dauesyn ta cur rish shee.
JAS.4.1	Cre voish ta cheet caggaghyn as streeughyn nyn mast’ eu? nagh vel ad cheet veih shoh
mac Ghavid: dy jarroo veih nyn sayntyn
ta caggey ayns nyn oltyn?

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.4.2	Ta shiu cur saynt
mac Ghavid: as cha vel eu: ta shiu dunverys
as dy jeean geearree dy gheddyn
column4: as cha vel eh cheet lhieu: ta shiu streeu as caggey

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.4.3	Ta shiu geearree as cha vel shiu geddyn
mac Ghavid: er-y-fa dy vel shiu geearree ass y raad

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.4.4	Shiuish gheiney as vraane maarderee [spyrrydoil
mac Ghavid: ] nagh vel fys eu dy vel caarjys y theihll noidys rish Jee? quoi-erbee er-y-fa shen saillish ve ny charrey da’n seihll
t’eh noid Yee.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.4.5	Vel shiu smooinaghtyn dy vel y scriptyr gra ayns fardail
mac Ghavid: Ta’n spyrryd ta cummal aynin greinnaghey gys troo?

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.4.6	Agh t’eh coyrt ny smoo dy ghrayse: shen-y-fa t’eh gra
mac Ghavid: Ta Jee cur eddin da ny mooaralee
as coyrt grayse dauesyn ta imlee.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.4.7	Jean-jee shiu hene y injillaghey er-y-fa shen gys Jee; shass-jee seose noi’n drogh-spyrryd
mac Ghavid: as ver eh cooyl diu:

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.4.8	Tayrn-jee er-gerrey gys Jee

shiuish pheccee
column4: as glen-jee nyn greeaghyn

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.4.9	Bee-jee seaghnit
mac Ghavid: as jean-jee dobberan as keayney: lhig da’n gharaghtee eu ve chyndaait gys dobberan

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.4.10	Bee-jee er nyn injillaghey ayns shilley’n Chiarn
mac Ghavid: as troggee eh shiu seose.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.4.11	Ny loayr-jee olk yn derrey yeh jeh’n jeh elley
mac Ghavid: vraaraghyn. Eshyn ta goltooaney e vraar
as briwnys e vraar
column4: t’eh goltooaney yn leigh

column7: agh jannoo oo hene dty vriw.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.4.12	Ta un er ayn ta bun y leigh

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.4.13	Tar-jee nish

column4: as fuirree mayd ayn bleïn

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.4.14	Ayns wheesh as nagh vel fys eu cre vees er laa ny vairagh. Son cre ta nyn mea? Te dy jarroo myr gall ta ry-akin son shallid

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.4.15	Son shoh lhisagh shiu gra
mac Ghavid: My saillish y Chiarn
as bea sodjey ’ve ain
column4: nee mayd shoh ny shid.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.4.16	Agh nish ta shiu goaill taitnys ayns y voggyssagh eu: ta ooilley lheid y voggyssagh peccoil.
JAS.4.17	Shen-y-fa eshyn ta fys echey dy yannoo mie
mac Ghavid: as nagh vel dy yannoo eh

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.5.1	Tar jee nish shiuish gheiney berchagh
mac Ghavid: keayn-jee as gull-jee son nyn dreihys hig erriu.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.5.2	Ta nyn merchys er n’gholl mow
mac Ghavid: as nyn goamraghyn eeit lesh lhemeenyn.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.5.3	Ta’n airh as aargid eu mergit; as bee’n mergey oc feanish nyn ’oï eu

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.5.4	Cur-my-ner
mac Ghavid: ta faill ny labreeyn
ta er vuinn ny magheryn eu
column4: ta lieriuish er ny reayll voue dy molteyragh
column5: gaccan: as ta eam ny beayneeyn er n’gholl stiagh ayns cleayshyn y Chiarn dy Heshaght-chaggee flaunys.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.5.5	Ta shiu er veaghey ayns soailid as rouanys er y thalloo; ta shiu er veiygh nyn greeaghyn
mac Ghavid: myr ayns laa yn vuitchoorys.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.5.6	Ta shiu er gheyrey as er varroo yn er-cairal; as cha vel eh dy lhiettal shiu.
JAS.5.7	Fark-jee er-y-fa shen
mac Ghavid: vraaraghyn
derrey cheet y Chiarn. Cur-my-ner
column4: ta’n eirinnagh farkiagh son mess berchagh y thallooin
column5: as t’eh farkiagh foddey er y hon
column6: derrey hig fliaghey cooie ny imbaghyn.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.5.8	Fark-jee shiuish myrgeddin dy surransagh; niartee-jee nyn greeaghyn: son ta cheet y Chiarn tayrn er-gerrey.
JAS.5.9	Ny gow-jee sproght goanlyssagh ry-cheilley
mac Ghavid: vraaraghyn
er-aggle dy bee shiu er nyn gheyrey: cur-my-ner ta’n briw shassoo ec y dorrys.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.5.10	My vraaraghyn
mac Ghavid: gow-jee ny phadeyryn
t’er loayrt ayns ennym y Chiarn
column4: son sampleyr jeh surranse seaghyn

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.5.11	Cur-jee my-ner

as cre chiare y Chiarn da ec y jerrey: dy vel y Chiarn feer chymmoil
column4: as jeh myghin veigh.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.5.12	Agh erskyn ooilley
mac Ghavid: my vraaraghyn
ny jean-jee loo
column4: chamoo liorish niau
column6: ny liorish loo erbee elley: agh lhig da’n ghlare eu ve she
column9: cha nee; er-aggle dy duitt shiu fo briwnys.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.5.13	Vel unnane erbee ny mast’ eu ayns seaghyn? lhig da padjer y ghoaill. Vel fer erbee gennal? lhig da arraneyn-moyllee ’ghoaill.
JAS.5.14	Vel veg ching ny mast’ eu? lhig da fys y choyrt er fir-reill ny hagglish; as lhig daue padjer y ghoaill er e hon

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.5.15	As nee’n phadjer lesh credjue yn aslayntagh y lheihys
mac Ghavid: as ver y Chiarn bea sodjey da; as my t’eh er n’yannoo peccah
bee eh er ny leih da.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.5.16	Gow-jee rish nyn voiljyn yn derrey yeh da’n jeh elley
mac Ghavid: as gow-jee padjer yn derrey yeh son y jeh elley
dy vod shiu v’er nyn lheihys: S’mooar y bree t’ayns padjer jeean creeoil yn dooinney crauee.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.5.17	Va Elias ny ghooinney fo annooinidyn dooghyssagh casley rooin hene
mac Ghavid: as ghuee eh dy jeean nagh jinnagh eh fliaghey: as cha ren eh fliaghey er y cheer fey three bleeaney as shey meeghyn.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.5.18	As ghow eh padjer reesht

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.5.19	Vraaraghyn
mac Ghavid: my ta unnane erbee eu goll er-shaghryn veih’n irriney
as fer dy hyndaa eh;

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: JAS.5.20	Lhig da fys ’ve echey
mac Ghavid: dy jean eshyn ta chyndaa yn peccah veih shaghrynys e raad

Galatia
column4: Cappadocia

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1PE.1.2	Reiht cordail rish tushtey ro-laue Yee yn Ayr

column4: as shee dy row er ny vishaghey.

liorish irree-seose-reesht Yeesey Creest veih ny merriu.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1PE.1.4	Gys eiraght shickyr as casherick
mac Ghavid: as nagh vel lheïe ersooyl
kiarit ayns niau nyn gour euish.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1PE.1.5	Ta er nyn vendeil liorish pooar Yee trooid credjue gys saualtys
mac Ghavid: aarloo dy ve er ny hoilshaghey ec y laa jerrinagh.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1PE.1.6	Son shoh ta shiu goaill mooarane boggey

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1PE.1.7	Dy vod prowal nyn gredjue ta foddey s’costal na airh ta ceau ersooyl

ve er ny gheddyn gys moylley
column4: as ooashley
column5: as gloyr ec cheet Yeesey Creest:

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1PE.1.8	Ersyn ta shiu graihagh
mac Ghavid: ga nagh vel shiu er vakin eh; ayn

column4: ny-yeih credjal
column5: ta shiu goaill boggey lesh boggey erskyn insh

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1PE.1.9	Cosney jerrey nyn gredjue
mac Ghavid: dy feer saualtys nyn anmeenyn.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1PE.1.10	Mychione y taualtys cheddin ta ny phadeyryn er vriaght
mac Ghavid: as er ronsaghey dy imneagh

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1PE.1.11	Ronsaghey cre

tra dymmyrk eh feanish ro-laue jeh surranse Chreest
column4: as yn ghloyr va dy eiyrt er.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1PE.1.12	Dauesyn ve er ny hoilshaghey

agh dooinyn
column4: ren ad shirveish ny reddyn ta nish er ny ockley magh lioroosyn ta er phreacheil y sushtal diuish

column6: ny reddyn cheddin ta ny ainleyn geearree baght y gheddyn jeu.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1PE.1.13	Shen-y-fa kiartee-jee seose meeghyn nyn aigney
mac Ghavid: bee-jee sheelt
as treisht-jee gys y jerrey
column4: son y ghrayse vees er ny choyrt diu tra vees Yeesey Creest er ny hoilshaghey;

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1PE.1.14	Myr cloan biallagh
mac Ghavid: cha nee cummey shiu hene cordail rish ny shenn chliaghtaghyn
ayns y vee-hushtey eu:

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1PE.1.15	Agh myr ta eshyn ta er n’eamagh erriu casherick
mac Ghavid: myr shen bee-jee shiuish casherick ayns nyn slane ymmyrkey-bea.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1PE.1.16	Son t’eh scruit
mac Ghavid: Bee-jee casherick
son ta mish casherick.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1PE.1.17	As my ta shiu genmys eshyn nyn Ayr
mac Ghavid: ta fegooish jannoo soiagh jeh persoonyn

column6: as dy vel goo Yee tannaghtyn ayndiu
column7: as dy vel shiu er gheddyn barriaght er y drogh-er.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.2.15	Ny cur jee graih da’n seihll
mac Ghavid: ny da nheeghyn y theihll. My ta dooinney erbee cur graih da’n seihll
cha vel graih yn Ayr aynsyn.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.2.16	Son ooilley ny ta ’sy theihll
mac Ghavid: saynt ny foalley
as saynt ny sooilley
column4: as moyrn y vea

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.2.17	As ta’n seihll goll shaghey
mac Ghavid: as y taynt ain huggey: agh eshyn ta jannoo aigney Yee
vees er-mayrn son dy bragh.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.2.18	Chloan veggey
mac Ghavid: shoh’n traa s’jerree: as myr ta shiu er chlashtyn dy jig yn an-chreestee
dy jarroo nish ta ymmodee an-chreesteenyn ayn; liorish shoh ta fys ain dy nee shoh’n traa s’jerree.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.2.19	Hie ad magh voïn
mac Ghavid: agh cha row ad j’in: son dy beagh ad j’inyn
v’ad dyn dooyt er hannaghtyn mârin: agh hreig ad shin
column4: dy voddagh enney v’er ny choyrt orroo

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.2.20	Agh ta shiu er ny ooillaghey liorish y fer casherick

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.2.21	Cha vel mee er scrieu hiu
mac Ghavid: er-yn-oyr nagh vel fys eu er yn irriney: agh er-yn-oyr dy vel fys eu er
as nagh vel breg erbee jeh’n irriney.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.2.22	Quoi yn breagerey
mac Ghavid: agh eshyn ta gobbal dy nee Yeesey yn Creest? Eshyn ta ny an-chreestee

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.2.23	Quoi-erbee ta gobbal y Mac
mac Ghavid: ta’n fer cheddin gobbal yn Ayr: [agh] eshyn ta goaill-rish y Mac

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.2.24	Lhig da shen eisht tannaghtyn ayndiu
mac Ghavid: ta shiu er chlashtyn er-dyn toshiaght. My nee shen ta shiu er chlashtyn er-dyn toshiaght tannaghtyn ayndiu
nee shiuish myrgeddin tannaghtyn ayns y Mac
column4: as ayns yn Ayr.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.2.25	As shoh yn gialdyn t’eh er n’yannoo dooin

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.2.26	Ny reddyn shoh ta mee er scrieu hiu

column4: as cha nee breg: as dy jarroo myr t’eh er n’ynsaghey shiu

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.2.28	As nish
mac Ghavid: chloan veggey

column5: as nagh bee mayd er nyn goyrt gys nearey ec y cheet echey.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.2.29	My ta fys eu dy vel eshyn cairagh

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.3.1	Cur-my-ner

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.3.2	My chaarjyn

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.3.3	As ta dy chooilley ghooinney ta’n treishteil shoh echey ayn hene

dy jarroo myr t’eshyn glen.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.3.4	Quoi-erbee ta jannoo peccah

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.3.5	As ta fys eu dy row eshyn er ny hoilshaghey dy ghoaill ersooyl nyn beccaghyn; as aynsyn cha vel veg y pheccah.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.3.7	Chloan veggey
mac Ghavid: ny lhig da dooinney erbee shin y volley: eshyn ta jannoo cairys

column4: dy jarroo myr t’eshyn cairagh.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.3.8	Eshyn ta jannoo peccah
mac Ghavid: t’eh jeh’n drogh-spyrryd; son ta’n drogh-spyrryd kyndagh jeh peccah er-dyn toshiaght. Son yn oyr shoh va Mac Yee er ny hoilshaghey
dy voddagh eh cur mow obbraghyn y drogh-spyrryd.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.3.9	Quoi-erbee t’er ny ruggey jeh Jee

er-y-fa dy vel eh er ny ruggey jeh Jee.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.3.10	Liorish shoh ta cloan Yee er nyn gronnaghey voish cloan y drogh-spyrryd: Quoi-erbee nagh vel jannoo cairys
mac Ghavid: cha vel eh jeh Jee
ny foast eshyn nagh nhynney lesh e vraar.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.3.11	Son shoh’n chaghteraght ta shiu er chlashtyn er-dyn toshiaght
mac Ghavid: dy lhisagh shin ve graihagh yn derrey yeh er y jeh elley.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.3.12	Cha nee myr va Cain

column4: as obbraghyn e vraarey cairagh.

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.3.13	Ny gow-jee yindys

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.3.14	Ta fys ain dy vel shin caghlaait veih baase gys bea

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.3.15	Quoi-erbee ta dwoaie echey er e vraar

MAT.1.1 Lioar sheeloghe Yeesey Creest: 1JN.3.16	Liorish shoh ta shin toiggal graih Yee
